Install Php5.2.x with yum.

  1. Enable development repositories on CentOS, but only for i386

http://wiki.centos.org/HowTos/PHP_5.1_To_5.2

  1. Only for Test Enviorment, not recommend for Prod. ðŸ™‚

$rpm â€“import http://www.jasonlitka.com/media/RPM-GPG-KEY-jlitka

# create /etc/yum.repos.d/utterramblings.repo

`$vi /etc/yum.repos.d/utterramblings.repo

paste the following lines

[utterramblings]
name=Jasonâ€™s Utter Ramblings Repo
baseurl=http://www.jasonlitka.com/media/EL$releasever/$basearch/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://www.jasonlitka.com/media/RPM-GPG-KEY-jlitka`

$yum update php

http://www.jasonlitka.com/yum-repository/
